total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 8s.
Q2: Determine the size of the output grid based on the identified areas.
Q3: Copy the contents of the identified areas to the output grid.
Q4: Check if there are any special numbers (like 2, 3, 4) in the copied areas.
Q5: If there are special numbers, maintain their position in the output grid.

Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 8s and contain a pattern of 0s and other numbers.
Q2: Determine the pattern of numbers within the identified areas from Q1.
Q3: Isolate these patterns and remove the surrounding 8s.
Q4: Identify any transformations or changes that occur within these patterns from the examples.
Q5: Apply the identified transformations or changes to the similar patterns in the quiz input grid.
Q6: Replace the transformed patterns back into the original grid, maintaining the position relative to the surrounding 8s.
